QuestData.Title: Dressing the Kill
QuestData.Description:
<Huln listens to your explanation, then pauses thoughtfully.>
I believe I understand, $n. But I cannot help you right now.
Allow me to explain. In the meantime, will you carve up this carcass with me? Your prey always has something to teach you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Huln Highmountain carve up the devourer.
